Class AlarmMangerHelper

java.lang.Object
com.example.studious.AlarmMangerHelper
public class AlarmMangerHelper extends Object
Class to help with setting system Alarms through AlarmManager

  • Method Details

    • createPendingIntent

      public android.app.PendingIntent createPendingIntent(int id)
      Create a unique pending (system token) intent for this item.

      Since we're not using a filter, this is going to use our unique row id for a unique request code. id is also stored in intent data for retrieval from the broadcast receiver.

      Parameters:
      id - unique id. Use row id from database.
      Returns:
      PendingIntent

    • findPendingIntent

      public android.app.PendingIntent findPendingIntent(int id)
      Find (an alarm) Pending intent for id.

      Not a check for an existing alarm but (it's close enough for hand grenades) we are going to use it that way.

      Parameters:
      id - id unique id. Use row id from database.
      Returns:
      found PendingIntent. Not null if alarm exists.

    • createRepeating

      public void createRepeating(Calendar c, int id)
      Schedule a repeating alarm.
      Parameters:
      c - Calendar item with date and time information.
      id - database (unique) row id of item.

    • createInexactRepeating

      public void createInexactRepeating(Calendar c, int id)
      Schedule a repeating alarm that has inexact trigger time requirements
      Parameters:
      c - Calendar item with date and time information.
      id - database (unique) row id of item.

    • createAlarm

      public void createAlarm(Calendar c, int id)
      Create Alarm callback.

      Sets system alarm Icon. Will fire if phone is in doze mode.

      Parameters:
      c - Calendar item with date and time information.
      id - database rowid of item

    • createCalendarAlert

      public void createCalendarAlert(Calendar c, int id)
      Create Calendar Alert Callback

      Does not set system alarm Icon. Will fire if phone is in doze mode.

      Parameters:
      c - Calendar item with date and time information.
      id - database rowid of item

    • createAlert

      public void createAlert(Calendar c, int id)
      Create Alert Callback.

      Will not fire in doze mode. Will not be called before time. System will batch these together. May be delayed until system convenient

      Parameters:
      c - Calendar item with date and time information.
      id - database rowid of item

    • cancelAlarm

      public void cancelAlarm(int id)
      cancel an alarm
      Parameters:
      id - unique (row) id of item.

    • processItem

      public boolean processItem(Items item)
      Process and item to add, delete, or modify an alarm.
      Parameters:
      item - instance of Items class.
      Returns:
      true if successful. false on error.

    • handleCallback

      public void handleCallback(int id)
      Properly handle a triggered alarm.
      Parameters:
      id - row id of item to handle.

    • recreateAllAlarms

      public void recreateAllAlarms()
      Recreate all alarms. Called on system reboot.
